venue.address_2: across from Roxbury Crossing Orange Line station
venue.address_1: 1350 Tremont St, cor. New Dudley St
venue.name: Reggie Lewis Center

item.description:
The Boston Vegetarian Society 15th Annual Boston Vegetarian Food Festival will be on Saturday, October 30, 2010, 10 AM - 6 PM and Sunday, October 31, 2010, 10 AM - 4 PM at the Reggie Lewis Athletic Center 1350 Tremont Street, Boston.

For more information check out BVS website: http://www.bostonveg....

I will be making my annual pilgrimage to the event on Saturday, October 30th. If you are planning on going I strongly suggest you plan on arriving around 9:30 a.m. because the convention hall gets packed early in the day. I usually try to check out all the vendors early in the day and then see a few of the speakers in the afternoon. I have been attending this event since 2002.

If you are interested in carpooling send me an e-mail with BVS CARPOOLING in the title and I will try to coordinate.

Thanks â€“ Kevin

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Vegetarian Society 15th Annual Boston Vegetarian Food Festival
